name: Jonathan Scarlett
content: Jonathan Scarlett's Home Page About Me I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science, Department of Mathematics, and Institute of Data Science at the National University of Singapore My research interests are in the areas of information theory, machine learning, and high-dimensional statistics. Please see my research and publications pages for details. Office: COM3 #02-57 (Comp. Sci.), S17 #05-17 (Maths) Phone: +65 6516 1179 (Comp. Sci.), +65 6516 2952 (Maths) Email: "scarlett" followed by "@comp.nus.edu.sg" News: (Sept. 2025) Paper Sequential 1-bit Mean Estimation with Near-Optimal Sample Complexity uploaded to arXiv (Sept.
